subject: I don't know about that!!
author: bhali333
full_text:
Frank, 

I just posted a truck load of great files from The little RS box, clear 
answers to direct questions that anyone can hear not that the box user 
needs to be an interpreter.

and tomorrow I'll post another load from my last Frank's box #12 session

but I don't think anyone has told the entities on the other side they
are not supposed to be communicating with me!

Bruce
